document_title: Chronic vaginitis: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis, treatment
subsection_name: viem-am-dao-man-tinh.json_3_Complications may occur with chronic vaginitis
subsection_content:
Symptoms of vaginitis can make women uncomfortable, frustrated, and lose confidence in work and daily life, especially in married life. If the disease persists, it can threaten a woman's health and motherhood.
If not treated promptly and properly, chronic vaginitis can cause upstream infections to other appendages such as endometritis, oophoritis, fallopian tube adhesions, pelvic inflammation... Consequences is causing infertility - sterility, making it difficult to conceive in women, or when pregnant, prone to ectopic pregnancy, miscarriage, premature birth...
Babies born to mothers with vaginitis may have bacterial or fungal infections in the eyes, mouth, pharynx or skin due to contact with the mother's vaginal fluids during childbirth.
In particular, chronic inflammation that persists for a long time and recurs many times can lead to many dangerous cancers such as cervical cancer, ovarian cancer...
